1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are often drawn to entrepreneurial pursuits.
2. Taurus - 4/10 - Practical and detail-oriented, Tauruses tend to be more interested in stability than risk-taking.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis thrive on novelty and fast-paced environments.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotionally intelligent and nurturing, Cancers are often more cautious when it comes to taking risks.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Charismatic and confident, Leos are natural performers who crave attention and applause.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Analytical and perfectionistic, Virgos tend to be risk-averse and prefer planning over spontaneity.
7. Libra - 6/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans are often drawn to harmony and balance in their pursuits.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpions are naturally inclined towards high-stakes ventures and investigations.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are always looking for the next big thrill and challenge.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, Capricorns tend to prioritize stability and security over taking risks.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are drawn to innovative and unconventional pursuits.
12. Pisces - 2/10 - Dreamy and imaginative, Pisces often prefer creative expression and subtle exploration rather than bold action.
